entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -6.1°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 84 %

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and blowing snow ending this morning then 30 percent chance of flurries. Near blizzard developing near noon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Near blizzard. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Near blizzard ending this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow at times late this evening and overnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
